articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of War Victory
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of War Victory
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture Sunday to mark the 56th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were senior Party, army and state officials, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, war veterans, those who performed exploits during the wartime, servicemen's families, working people in the city, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a report.
					
					 July 27, Juche 42 (1953) is brilliantly recorded in the history of the country as the day of the second liberation as the army and people of the DPRK, united close around President Kim Il Sung, beat back the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, in the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War and won historic victory, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 The said war was the just anti-imperialist revolutionary war in which the young DPRK honorably defended the independence of the country and the sovereignty of the nation from the world imperialist allied forces led by the U.S. 
					
					 In the three-year-long war the army and people of the DPRK under the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Il Sung inflicted a disgraceful defeat on the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and demonstrated with high pride before the era and history that invincible is the strength of the independent people who rose up heroically to protect their destiny.
					
					 The heroic feats and popular heroism displayed by the army and people in the war were a noble manifestation of the lofty ideological and moral traits and the matchless patriotic self-sacrificing spirit of the revolutionary soldiers who regarded it as the worthiest life and greatest happiness to unhesitatingly dedicate their precious youth and lives to the Party and the leader, the country and the revolution as they grew up under the care of the President.
					
					 Noting that the world peace-loving progressive people including the Chinese people positively supported and encouraged the army and people of the DPRK in their fight for justice during the war, the reporter said that the Korean people always remember this.
					
					 The reporter noted: The President led the grimmest and most arduous Fatherland Liberation War to a shining victory with his ever-victorious military and political leadership. The undying feats performed by the President in the war served as a banner inspiring the army and people of the DPRK to win victory after victory in the confrontation with the U.S. generation after generation and noble revolutionary assets. The undying feats and tradition he performed in the war have been firmly carried forward and glorified under the outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 More than half a century has passed since the ceasefire of the war but durable peace has not yet settled in this land but stand-off with imperialism is going on.
					
					 A touch-and-go situation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the reckless "sanctions" and military provocations of the U.S., the south Korean bellicose forces and the Japanese reactionaries against the DPRK.
					
					 We will mercilessly and resolutely counter the enemy's "sanctions" with retaliation, its "all-out war" with all-out war. We will deal unimaginably deadly blows at the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets if they ignite a war, obsessed with a foolish ambition, and achieve the historic cause of national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, without fail.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble at the April 25 House of Culture Sunday on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 It was appreciated by senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, heroes, war veterans, servicepersons of the KPA, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, those who performed exploits during the wartime, families of the People's Army servicemen, working people in Pyongyang, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas compatriots.  
					
					 The performance started with tap-dance "Holiday Celebrating Victory." Its repertoire included dance "My Heavy Machine Gun", male chorus "Song of National Defence", trumpet trio and mixed chorus "For My Only Motherland." 
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the greatness of President Kim Il Sung who humbled the arrogant U.S. imperialists with his outstanding strategy and tactics and matchless pluck and demonstrated the stamina and dignity of heroic Korea to the whole world and the fighting spirit of the soldiers of the KPA who devotedly defended the freedom and independence of the country. 
					
					 Also put on the stage were male tenor quartette "O My Country of Songun", guitar quartette ensemble "Soldier on March," mixed chorus "Let's Uphold Our Supreme Commander with Arms" and other numbers. These numbers impressively dealt with the immortal exploits of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il and the high spirit of the KPA protecting the Party and the leader and the socialist cause with arms.

articles.title: Dancing Party Held by Ministry of People's Armed Forces
articles.content:
Dancing Party Held by Ministry of People's Armed Forces
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- A dancing party was sponsored by the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces at Jonsung Square Sunday to celebrate the 56th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 As song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" resounded forth, the square turned into a sea of dancers.
					
					 The participants danced, recollecting with deep emotion the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung. They paid highest tribute to him who defeated two formidable imperialisms with his outstanding Songun idea and leadership, winning a great victory, and made a great contribution to accomplishing the popular masses' cause of independence.  
					
					 Servicepersons presented dynamic and diverse dances to the tune of songs "Our General Is the Best", "Victory of Songun in Twelve Months" and others. They extended highest glory and deepest gratitude to Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il who is bringing about a final victory in the showdown with the United States by pursuing the Songun politics.

articles.title: War Memorial Tower Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
War Memorial Tower Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower is visited by an endless stream of servicepersons, people from all walks of life and school youth and children in the run-up to the 56th anniversary of the victory in the war.
					 It has been visited by at least 5.7 million persons of more than 40,000 organizations over the last 16 years since the memorial tower was completed. 
					
					 Going round the memorial tower, visitors feel pride and honor of being members of Kim Il Sung's nation which beat back the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, the south Korean puppet army and troops of their 15 satellite countries, honorably defending the freedom and independence of the country, national sovereignty and the gains of the revolution. 
					
					 They vow to take a thousand-fold revenge upon the U.S. imperialists who have desperately persisted in the war moves against the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from their disgraceful defeat in the last Korean War.
					
					 Overseas compatriots and foreigners who visited the memorial tower expressed admiration at the Juche-oriented military idea and outstanding commanding art of President Kim Il Sung and the heroic feats performed by the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Congratulations to Mauritanian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Mauritanian President
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Mohamed Ould Abdelaziz upon his election as President of Mauritania.
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished him success in his work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK to Fulfil All Its Responsibilities to Protect Peace and Security
articles.content:
DPRK to Fulfil All Its Responsibilities to Protect Peace and Security
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will boost its friendly and cooperative relations with the countries in the region and fulfil all its responsibilities to protect the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the region in line with the idea of its foreign policy--independence, peace and friendship in the future, too. 
					 The head of the delegation of the DPRK said this at the 16th ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum held in Thailand on July 23. 
					
					 This year marks the 15th anniversary of the foundation of the ARF, he noted, adding that it has clearly demonstrated its vitality in this period. 
					
					 The ARF has traversed the road of meaningful development as it observed the principle of respect for sovereignty and equality, he pointed out, and continued:
					
					 It is the Cold War-minded logic lingering on the peninsula to assert that anyone having different ideology and social system is liable to become an object of enmity and strangulation. The tense situation prevailing on the peninsula is arousing serious apprehension inside and outside Korea. 
					
					 Noting that what is important for seeking ways for settling the situation is to have correct understanding of the nature and root cause of the situation, he clarified some points related to this. 
					
					 The situation prevailing on the peninsula goes to prove that the United Nations Security Council not only lacks democracy but has gone beyond the tolerance limit in the application of double standards and in the aspect of partiality and in acting a servant for those perpetrating high-handed practices, the speaker noted, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent is by no means a lever for invading or threatening others but war deterrent for protecting the peace and security on the peninsula in the true sense of the word.
					
					 He expressed hope that the members of the ARF would have proper understanding of the nature and root cause of the peculiar situation on the peninsula and invariably adhere to the objective and principle laid down by it 15 years back.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Ecuadorian Figure
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Ecuadorian Figure
Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Trotsky Serano, international secretary of the Socialist Party-Ample Front of Ecuador and president of the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The gift was conveyed to the head of the DPRK group of assistants in Koryo medicine working in Ecuador on July 15.

articles.title: Projected Ulji Freedom Guardian under Fire
articles.content:
Projected Ulji Freedom Guardian under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" announced on July 24 that joint military exercises Ulji Freedom Guardian would be staged from August 17 to 27, according to KBS of south Korea.  
					 These joint military maneuvers will be participated in by commands  of army corps and fleet and flying corps of the puppet armed forces and above and at least 56,000 troops and more than 10,000 U.S. troops present in south Korea and overseas. They were reported to be staged under a new joint operational scenario instead of the existing OPLAN 5027.
					
					 These joint military exercises are aimed at invading the north in view of their programs and scale. This lays bare the black-hearted aim lurking behind "peace keeping" and "dialogue" much publicized by the U.S. imperialists and the puppet group of traitors.

articles.title: Actions to Force Lee Myung Bak to Step Down Called for
articles.content:
Actions to Force Lee Myung Bak to Step Down Called for
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on July 23 calling for actions to eliminate the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					 The statement said that all the people are declaring the evil law on media, which the group railroaded through the "National Assembly" through violent and high-handed actions, null and void, not recognizing it. 
					
					 It noted:
					
					 Lurking behind the above-said action taken by the group in defiance of the people's will is its sinister intention to put the media under its control in a bid to blindfold their eyes and  stop  their ears and gag them and render the members of society benighted.
					
					 Another aim sought by the group through the action is to use the conservative media for misleading the public opinion in a bid to strengthen the repressive rule and legalize the unpopular policy in favor of a tiny handful of privileged circles. 
					
					 It called upon all the patriotic people to stage a nation-wide movement for issuing declarations on the situation in unity and thus force Lee Myung Bak to step down and get the "Grand National Party" disbanded. 
					
					 In another development, the People's Council for Public Welfare and Democracy and the Civic and Public Organizations Network for Defending Democracy and Checking Suppression under the Pretext of Security also held a joint press conference in Seoul on the same day to denounce the GNP for ramming the evil law on media through the NA. The south Korean Press Trade Union held a meeting to declare a struggle to get the above-said evil law repealed.

articles.title: War Victory Day of Korean People Observed in Bulgaria
articles.content:
War Victory Day of Korean People Observed in Bulgaria 
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released a bulletin on July 20 on the occasion of July 27, the war victory day of the DPRK.
					 In such articles as "War Victory Day" and "Years of Confrontation" the bulletin referred in detail to the facts that the U.S. imperialists ignited a war to destroy the young DPRK in its cradle after occupying south Korea at the end of the Second World War but the servicemen of the heroic Korean People's Army went over to a prompt counterattack by the order of President Kim Il Sung, dealing telling blows at the enemy troops.
					
					 The bulletin went on:
					
					 The wild dream of the U.S. imperialists to occupy the whole of Korea was frustrated by the matchless courage and self-sacrificing spirit of the Korean People's Army and people. The Korean people achieved a great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The bulletin also carried an article proving the justice of the measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the desperate moves of the U.S. imperialists for aggression and an article telling readers that the 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival was held in Pyongyang with great success.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Italy
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Italy
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The representative of the Italian branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain made public a statement on July 8 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said that when July 8 came every year he recollected along what road of progress and development Kim Il Sung led the DPRK.
					
					The Italian branch of the KFA is widely introducing the great ideas and theories and leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il among Italians on the basis of the reality of socialist Korea, it noted.
					
					 It expressed the will to intensify the movement for voicing support and solidarity with the Korean people in their efforts to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in Peru, Democratic Congo and Egypt from July 5 to 8 to commemorate the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display in the venues of the meetings were works of the peerlessly great persons, photos on their undying exploits and books and photos on the advantages of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, spoke of the emotion he had when he was received by the President during his visit to the DPRK, noting that Kim Il Sung was a great statesman and a prominent leader recognized by the world.
					
					 Thanks to the solid foundation laid by Kim Il Sung, the DPRK could frustrate the moves stepped up by the U.S. to stifle it, styling itself the world's "only superpower," and demonstrate the might of a politico-ideological power and military power to the whole world, he added.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, said that Kim Il Sung would always live in the hearts of the world progressive people as he founded the immortal Juche idea, clearly indicating the road to be followed by humankind in the era of independence and building a socialist system centered on the popular masses in Korea.
					
					Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the revolutionary cause of Juche started by Kim Il Sung has been successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il. The Korean people under his Songun leadership will surely build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in Korea and achieve the cause of national reunification without fail, he stressed.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Patriotic Forces Denounced in India and Finland
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Patriotic Forces Denounced in India and Finland
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on July 16 in denunciation of the Lee Myung Bak group's suppression of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					 The statement branded the south Korean authorities' suppression as a grave provocation to the will of all the Korean people for reunification and national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' illegal and criminal suppression of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon calling for peaceful reunification is contrary to the desire and will of all the Korean people to independently and peacefully reunify Korea, it noted, urging the authorities to give up such anti-reunification policy as yielding to outside forces and standing in confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 It demanded the south Korean authorities stop at once the fascist suppression of the reunification movement organizations and immediately release the illegally arrested personages of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					
					 Reiterating the support for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, the statement urged the U.S. to withdraw its troops and nukes from south Korea at once.
					
					 The Finland-Korea Society in its statement on July 19 bitterly denounced the Lee group's suppression of pro-reunification patriotic forces and strongly demanded the south Korean authorities repeal the fascist "National Security Law" at once and respect the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The statement expressed full support to the progressive pro-reunification patriotic forces in south Korea in their struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated in American Region
articles.content:
Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated in American Region
 Pyongyang, July 26 (KCNA) -- An American regional preparatory committee to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Lima, Peru, on July 14.
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru and first vice-chairman of the Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea, Emilia Fernandes, member of the Senate of National Congress of Brazil, and Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremony. 
					
					 A declaration was read out at the ceremony. It said that preparatory committees in different countries of the American region would briskly organize diverse events, closely cooperating with one another under the coordinated guidance of the regional preparatory committee. 
					
					 It called for forming a worldwide preparatory committee to mark the centenary of birth of the President grouping preparatory committees of different countries and regions.
